metadata.description: The base URL where artifacts required by this template are located. When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a private location in the subscription will be used and this value will be automatically generated.
The name of the new lab instance to be created.
The timezone of the lab.
Set 'Auto Shutdown' policy: The UTC time at which the Lab VMs will be automatically shutdown (E.g. 17:30, 20:00, 09:00).
Set 'max VM allowed per user' policy: The maximum number of VMs allowed per user.
Set 'Total VMs allowed in Lab' policy: The maximum number of VMs allowed per lab.
Set 'allowed VM sizes' policy: A comma-separated list of VM sizes that are allowed in the lab.
OpenShift Master VM size
OpenShift Node VM(s) size
OpenShift Infra Node VM(s) size
Use Managed or Unmanaged Disks
OpenShift cluster prefix.  Used to generate master, infra and node hostnames.  Maximum of 20 characters.
Number of OpenShift masters.
Number of OpenShift infra nodes.
Number of OpenShift nodes
Size of Datadisk in GB for Docker volume
Administrator username on all VMs and first user created for OpenShift login
Password for OpenShift user to login to OpenShift Console
SSH public key for all VMs
Enable OpenShift Metrics: true or false
Enable OpenShift Logging: true or false
Enable Cockpit: true or false
Resource Group that contains the Key Vault
Name of the Key Vault
Key Vault Secret Name that contains the Private Key
Enable Azure as Cloud Provider - true or false
Azure AD Client ID
Azure AD Client Secret
Default Subdomain type - nip.io or custom (defined in next parameter)
Default Subdomain for application routing (Wildcard DNS) - must enter something even if you are using nip.io

properties.description: Allow SSH in from all locations
Allow HTTPS connections from all locations
Allow OpenShift Console connections from all locations
Allow SSH in from all locations
Allow HTTPS connections from all locations
Allow HTTP connections from all locations
Allow SSH in from all locations
Allow HTTPS connections from all locations
Allow HTTP connections from all locations
